name: Mini Gay Boyfriend
description:
A gay boyfriend that fits in your pocket - the perfect app whether you're gay, straight or just mini-curious!

REVIEWS:

"There's a pinch of magic to Mini Gay Boyfriend. The animation's cute and the hoops you must jump through - almost literally - to keep your man happy, addictive" - Gay Times

"Mini Gay Boyfriend is a new app we’ve been trying out today here in the Same Same office – and we love it!" - samesame.com.au

"It is quirky in its approach, and the gameplay is incredibly easy to pick up." - sosogay.org

"The minigames are widely varied, each one playing out in a different manner - no reskinned duplicates to pad out the content here... Mini Gay Boyfriend is a very solid product!" - gaygamer.net

"I’m not a gay man but I still know an enjoyable game when I see one... both in terms of cutesy appeal and in terms of breaking new ground, it’s certainly something to remember." - 148Apps.com

"Mini Gay Boyfriend is fun, addicting and rewarding in itself with clean, yet suggestive humour. Digicub did a great job with its development and made it fun for everyone." - examiner.com

#1 GAY GAME in over 70 countries!

MINI GAY BOYFRIEND

Choose from 27 mini gays and start flirting your way into his heart. Play a range of cute and addictive mini games to wink, hug and kiss your way through the early stages.

Start dating and take your mini gay for coffee, to the cinema or out for dinner. If you're missing some romance, why not treat him to breakfast in bed, a picnic in the park or even a candlelit bubble bath?

You can even adopt a pet to care for! But don’t forget to feed it – nothing says it's over like a dead pug.

Your mini gay boyfriend will make you wonder why you ever bothered with real life relationships. But don’t worry, he won’t mind if you have a real life partner. We just can’t promise the reverse will be true!

Happy romancing
